metadata.subject: Schmidel, Casimir Christoph, 1718-1792
Booksellers and bookselling
Botanical literature
metadata.title: Avertissement
metadata.creator: Bischoff, Valentin
Bischoff, Valentin
Schmidel, Casimir Christoph, 1718-1792. Icones plantarum
metadata.description: Advertisement for v. 1, pt. 1 of Schmidel's "Icones platarum", and prospectus for pt. 2, edited by Valentin Bischoff
Signed: À Nuremberg, ce 2. octob. 1775, Valentin Bischoff, graveur en taille douce

"Volume I. partie I. de 25 planches sur du papier de Hollande & bien coloriées, in folio imperial, 1773. Chez Valentin Bischoff ... à 16 fl. ... cette seconde partie du premier volume consistera aussi ... en vingt cinq planches enluminées, qui coutent ensemble ... trente trois florins."
metadata.notes: No copyright found. No table of contents found. Damaged, stained pages. No page numbers.
